caller_intent: Rosalia is contacting Alliance Insurance regarding a call she received about her mother-in-law Juliana Romero's accident case and needs assistance with the insurance claim.
resolution_steps: Agent acknowledges the call and asks for clarification.
Rosalia explains the call is about her mother-in-law's accident case.
Agent offers to transfer her to a Spanish-speaking representative.
knowledge_required: Ability to transfer calls to language-specific representatives
summary: Rosalia called Alliance Insurance regarding a claim related to her mother-in-law's accident. The agent offered to transfer her to a Spanish-speaking representative to address the case, resulting in a pending callback.
